sourcesContent:
module.exports = scale

/**
 * Scales a vec2 by a scalar number
 *
 * @param {vec2} out the receiving vector
 * @param {vec2} a the vector to scale
 * @param {Number} b amount to scale the vector by
 * @returns {vec2} out
 */
function scale(out, a, b) {
    out[0] = a[0] * b
    out[1] = a[1] * b
    return out
}
